pages.text:
About  Us
Our Story
About Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar
Step into a world where sophistication meets warmth and indulge in the perfect blend of exquisite cigars and fine wines. At Fedora's Cigar and Wine Bar, curated by passionate owner Michelle Lerario, every visit promises an experience that transcends the ordinary. Discover a haven where the rich aroma of premium cigars mingles with the notes of the finest wines. Whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or exploring the world of cigars and wines for the first time, Fedora's invites you to savor the moment, enjoy the company, and create memories. Our curated selection, warm ambiance, and heartfelt hospitality are all designed to make you feel at home. Join us in celebrating the art of relaxation and the joy of shared indulgence. Cheers to unforgettable moments at Fedora's Cigar and Wine Bar!
Contact Us
We Have Lockers Available!
20% off all boxes
10% off all sticks & accessories
3 day preview for any ticketed events
Questions & Answers
Frequently Asked Questions
1. What types of cigars do you offer at Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar?
At Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar, we offer a wide range of delightful cigars. There's something to cater to everyone's preference. Whether you're a seasoned cigar smoker or a beginner, we are more than happy to provide recommendations.
​Some of our featured brands:
AJ Fernandez,
Arturo Fuentes,
Ashton,
CAO,
Camacho,
Don Pepin,
Drew Estates,
Esteban Carerras,
​Foundation,
Herrera Esteli,
Illusione,
​Oscar Valladares,
Liga Pravada (when available),
LFD,
Macanudo,
Montecristo,
My Fathers​,
Oliva,
Padron,
Perdomo,
Rocky Patel,
Romeo Y Julietta,
Tatuaje,
Villiger
2. Do you serve alcohol at your lounge?
Currently, our drink menu comprises of a diverse selection of non-alcoholic beverages, a wide variety of wine, and large selection of beer. We've intentionally curated our beverage menu to complement the flavors of cigars that our patrons enjoy.
3. Can I book the lounge for private events?
Absolutely! Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar is an ideal venue for private events, ranging from birthdays to corporate gatherings. We will work with you to ensure your event needs are catered to.
4. I've never tried cigars before. Would Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar be a good place to start?
Definitely. We pride ourselves in providing an inviting environment for both experienced cigar smokers and newcomers. With our knowledge, we will gladly walk you through the process and recommend flavors that first-time users often enjoy.
Host Your Next Celebration With Us
Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar offers unparalleled ambience and service. Contact us to book your private party or event.
Book Now

Contact Us
Contact Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar
We Look Forward to Hearing from You!
Have a question about our bar?
Interested in booking a private party?
Whatever it is, we are only a call or "click" away. Give us a call or use the form below to contact us!

Punta Gorda, FL 33950

Host Your Next Event at Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar
Do you have an upcoming birthday or other special occasion to celebrate? Looking to entertain clients or get together with friends? You’ll love the chill and relaxing vibes here at Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar. We know that while you may have plenty of other bars and lounges to consider in and near Punta Gorda, very few places can compare to the atmosphere, drinks, and level of service at Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar.
Feel free to browse our cigar menu and view some of our offerings. Don't hesitate to contact us! We will be happy to assist you and answer any questions you may have.
Contact Us
Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar is the Perfect Venue for Any Occasion
Birthdays • Corporate Events • Sporting Events • Engagement Parties • Bachelor Parties • Bachelorette Parties • Bridal Showers • Holiday Parties • and more!
Contact Us
Host Your Next Celebration With Us
Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar offers unparalleled ambience and service. Contact us to book your private party or event.
